data.partBlankContent:
My mother
has a big fam___. She h__ seven brot____ and sis____, a__ all o_ them ha__ sons

data.fullContent: My mother has a big family. She has seven brothers and sisters, and all of them have sons and daughters. They have lived in the same town as us all my life. So all my cousins and I grew up together, and they were around to play with.
data.answer: 我妈妈有一个大家庭。她有七个兄弟姐妹，他们都有儿子和女儿。他们一直和我们住在同一个镇上。所以我所有的堂兄弟姐妹和我一起长大，我们可以一起玩耍。
